decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the application documents: Block Plan, Location Map, Design, Access & Heritage Statement for 71 Princes Gardens, Page 1 dated 28.05.2021 (Existing Elevations), Page 2 dated 28.05.2021 (Proposed Elevations), 1804 (Traditional Flush Casement - Cill Section Fixed Sash (Frame & Sash)), 1806 (Traditional Flush Casement - Head Section Frame & Sash), 1809 (Traditional Flush Casement S - Jamb Section Frame & Sash (Hinge Side)), 1811 (Traditional Flush Casement - Solid Mullion Section (Sash / Sash)), 1812 (Traditional Flush Casement - Solid Mullion Section (Fixed Sash / Fixed Sash)) and 1814 (Traditional Flush Casement - Solid Transom Section (Fixed Sash / Fixed Sash)).

Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those stated within the submitted application form and approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and conservation area in accordance with policies 7B, 7C, 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act (1990) and the NPPF (2021).
description: Replacement of all existing white painted timber framed windows to front elevation with white painted timber framed windows.
